update_info.commit_message: Added 44+ ad networks blocking (Korean 14 + International 30). Features: Anti-Adblock bypass, Shadow DOM blocking, Dynamic script injection blocking, Bait ad removal. Complete global ad blocking solution.

filters.name: K-FILTER Base
filters.description: 한국 광고 네트워크 + 주요 사이트 최적화

update_info.commit_message: Korean ad networks blocking with comprehensive site-specific rules. Optimized for Naver, Kakao, Daum, DCInside, and other major Korean sites.
Gentle ad blocking for maximum site compatibility. Blocks only core ad networks. Perfect for users who prioritize site functionality.
